snippet: Army officials detailed the slurs and mistreatment directed at Danny Chen, whose suicide in Afghanistan led the military to bring charges against eight members of his battalion.
abstract: Army officials detail the slurs and mistreatment directed at Private Danny Chen, whose suicide in Afghanistan led the military to bring charges against eight members of his battalion.
lead_paragraph: Army officials detailed the slurs and mistreatment directed at Danny Chen, whose suicide in Afghanistan led the military to bring charges against eight members of his battalion.

headline.seo: Private Chen’s Family Learns More About Hazing by Fellow G.I.’s

headline.print_headline: Family Learns More About Hazing of G.I.
